content: hygge leg warmers a witching hour knits design i m a firm believer that one can never have too many knits to layer up with especially if you re going to be tromping through the snow leg warmers are a sure fire way to keep yourself cozy these knit up quickly with an easy to follow textured repeat knit them for yourself or whip them up as a quick gift the leg warmers should be knit with a bit of negative ease to help ensure they stay in place when worn materials - approx 220 275 yds of worsted weight yarn - us 8 double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge - tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 4 sts and 6 25 row per inch on us 8 needle or size needed for gauge finished measurements 12 15 in circumference by 17 in length pattern abbreviations and techniques - k knit - p purl - m1 make one stitch - st s stitch es instructions cast on 40 50 sts and divide over 3 needles join in the round being careful not to twist and work in k1 p1 ribbing for 12 rounds on next round *k5 m1* repeat from * to * around 48 sts/60 sts rounds 1-4 knit round 5 *k3 p1* repeat from * to * around rounds 6-9 knit round 10 *k1 p1 k2* repeat from * to * around work rounds 1-10 a total of 8 times then work in k1 p1 ribbing for 12 rounds bind off loosely in ribbing repeat for the second leg warmer and block both gently pattern questions can be directed to witchinghourknits@gmail com this pattern is for personal use and not to be re-distributed © dora violet
